segments.text: Can you show me some jade , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . Do you like a jade necklace ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but I do like jade bracelets .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here are all kinds of jades . Choose whatever you like , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . ( A moment later ) Oh , this one is quite impressive . I'll take it . By the way , do you sell pearl earrings ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Natural pearls or cultured pearls ? We have both kinds .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wonder which looks more lustrous .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , natural pearls are of higher value , but the cultured pearls have equal lustre and are just as beautiful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . I think I prefer a natural one .
segments.speaker: S1
